content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(-14.0, -51.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -14.0, -51.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt. Check the inventory and insert required items as needed.

### Errors when trying to set the recipe for the furnace
- Make sure the furnace is correctly placed and operational before setting the recipe. If the furnace is not found, verify its position and status.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. Check your inventory to confirm available resources.

### Errors when the furnace has no ingredients
- Monitor the furnace status and ensure that it has the necessary ingredients to continue smelting. If it shows "NO_INGREDIENTS," check the inventory and insert required items.
